oneOf.title: Education and professional training provided by recognized institutions
Exemption on particular bank and financial transactions
Particular real estate rental (farm land and buildings; unmanaged soil; unequipped business premises)
Cost reimbursement of equipment by members of grouping
Not for profit organizations (including groupings of blind or disabled workers, philosophical, religious, political, civic organizations or unions)
Second hand objects sold by their users
Industry brand-new wastes and recycling/recovering materials
